content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413192424461-Overview-of-Optimizely-Products\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Overview of Optimizely Products – Support Help Center\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Optimizely Digital Experience Platform\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The base of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform (DXP) is Optimizely Content Management System (CMS), Optimizely Custom Commerce (B2C), and Optimizely Campaign for content publishing, merchandising and campaign management. The platform can be extended with applications (apps) in areas like e-commerce, search, marketing, and personalization, providing a powerful and user-friendly foundation for managing the digital experience for your online visitors.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":50681,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ef190ef0-d4d6-49c6-ba17-35ef1ee10bf6/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ef190ef0-d4d6-49c6-ba17-35ef1ee10bf6/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ef190ef0-d4d6-49c6-ba17-35ef1ee10bf6\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":268},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":50681,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5023a839-f4f6-4982-9c48-c87d48d307bd/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5023a839-f4f6-4982-9c48-c87d48d307bd/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5023a839-f4f6-4982-9c48-c87d48d307bd\",\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Content Management System\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Content Management System (CMS) is a powerful yet easy to use web content management system, based on cutting edge technology. The intuitive user interface and superior usability of CMS lets  experienced and occasional users efficiently manage website content. Optimizely CMS is the foundation for the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform, and is required for most Optimizely products and extensions. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413192348813\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Content Management System (CMS)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":65783,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/23e6b2b1-5196-4f76-96e0-4c870dccef3e/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/23e6b2b1-5196-4f76-96e0-4c870dccef3e/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"23e6b2b1-5196-4f76-96e0-4c870dccef3e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":302},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Content Marketing Platform\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Content Marketing Platform (CMP) brings teams together on a single platform to share plans, collaborate on assets and flawlessly execute campaigns. See also \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://docs.developers.optimizely.com/content-cloud/v12.0.0-content-cloud/docs/welcome-integration-with-cms\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Integrate Optimizely Content Marketing Platform with Optimizely Content Management System\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Customized Commerce\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Adding Optimizely Customized Commerce to your CMS solution brings e-commerce functionality such as catalog, customer, and order management, combining the powerful content publishing and display features of CMS with advanced back-end web shop management. Optimizely Customized Commerce is part of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform. It requires a specific installation and license. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413205539725\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Customized Commerce\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":55555,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/775149d8-eb76-4a8c-aad8-9ca5aedcecbe/Picture3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/775149d8-eb76-4a8c-aad8-9ca5aedcecbe/Picture3.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture3.png\",\"name\":\"Picture3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"775149d8-eb76-4a8c-aad8-9ca5aedcecbe\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":299},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Configured Commerce\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Configured Commerce provides e-commerce functionality for business-to-business (B2B) customers. Its features include catalog, customer, and order management, and combines powerful content publishing and display features of CMS with advanced back-end web shop management. Configured Commerce is part of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform. It requires a specific installation and license. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413191512077\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Get started with Optimizely Configured Commerce\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".  See also \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://docs.developers.optimizely.com/commerce/v1.2.0-b2b-commerce/docs/b2b-commerce-content-cloud-overview\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Integrate Optimizely Configured Commerce with Optimizely Content Management System\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Product Information Management\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Natively built to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/sections/4413191464717-B2B-Commerce-Integration\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"integrate with Optimizely Configured Commerce\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", Optimizely Product Information Management (PIM) lets small teams set up their catalog and product data requirements and provides functionality to efficiently manage the data acquisition and curation process. It also \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/sections/4413191465229-B2C-Commerce-Integration\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"integrates with Optimizely Customized Commerce\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and requires a specific installation and license. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413191688077\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Product Information Management\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Campaign\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With Optimizely Campaign you can orchestrate omnichannel campaigns from a single screen, and send triggered emails based on real-time behavior. You can coordinate and segment large volumes of messages, including personalized product recommendation. Optimizely Campaign is part of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform. It is delivered as a service, and requires specific license keys and setup. After service onboarding, you can access it from your web browser. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413200424717\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Campaign\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":34474,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25f2bb6d-af35-4be7-95f9-a8f439f212e1/Picture4.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25f2bb6d-af35-4be7-95f9-a8f439f212e1/Picture4.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture4.png\",\"name\":\"Picture4.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"25f2bb6d-af35-4be7-95f9-a8f439f212e1\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":211},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Search & Navigation\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Search & Navigation adds advanced search functionality to websites. Optimizely Search & Navigation bases search functionality on visitor search behavior and website statistics. Using this information, you can add automatic landing pages, adaptive navigation, and guided search to increase website traffic and boost conversion rates. Optimizely Search & Navigation is part of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform. It is included in the Optimizely Cloud services; for on-premises installations it requires a specific installation and license. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413200739341\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Search & Navigation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":47991,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6ace2593-a595-44ee-84ed-9a6f3f2ce296/Picture5.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6ace2593-a595-44ee-84ed-9a6f3f2ce296/Picture5.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture5.png\",\"name\":\"Picture5.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6ace2593-a595-44ee-84ed-9a6f3f2ce296\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":270},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Visitor Intelligence\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Visitor Intelligence is a user interface for viewing and filtering visitor profiles, and creating customer segments that can be used in omnichannel marketing campaigns. The Optimizely Visitor Intelligence information is based on tracking of the behavior of your online visitors, for example when viewing content, or products on an e-commerce site. Optimizely Visitor Intelligence is part of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform. It requires a specific installation and license. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413205687949\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Visitor Intelligence\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":52262,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2a89452c-06ff-4a77-b511-9f09c46c82c2/Picture6.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2a89452c-06ff-4a77-b511-9f09c46c82c2/Picture6.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture6.png\",\"name\":\"Picture6.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2a89452c-06ff-4a77-b511-9f09c46c82c2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":309},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Content Recommendations\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Content Recommendations anonymously tracks visitor activity on a website to build a profiles for each visitor. Analysis of a unique profile lets you deliver the most relevant content to each visitor. For example, based on the visitor's activity on the website, the topic cloud in the following image shows a visitor's interest in retirement, which you can use to recommend articles, blog posts, or other content related to retirement planning. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413192351117\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Content Recommendations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":56641,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/789a43c3-b19d-44f9-980a-2c7b597d5a8a/Picture7.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/789a43c3-b19d-44f9-980a-2c7b597d5a8a/Picture7.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture7.png\",\"name\":\"Picture7.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"789a43c3-b19d-44f9-980a-2c7b597d5a8a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":206},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Product Recommendations\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Product Recommendations lets you create and configure a merchandising campaign with personalized product recommendations from the personalization portal. Wherever you display your products – on the web or on a mobile device – Optimizely optimizes the ranking for every visitor, including behavioral data and merchandising strategies. Product Recommendations is part of the Optimizely Digital Experience Platform. It requires a specific installation and license. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413200703501\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Product Recommendations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":34400,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/59228769-68b5-4ea6-8842-eb05205d332f/Picture8.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/59228769-68b5-4ea6-8842-eb05205d332f/Picture8.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture8.png\",\"name\":\"Picture8.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"59228769-68b5-4ea6-8842-eb05205d332f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":259},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Email Product Recommendations\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Email Product Recommendations lets you include personalized product recommendations in any email, including cart abandonment and retargeting emails, from the personalization portal. You can also work with behavioral triggers to detect on site behaviors and act upon them through automated personalized emails. Email Product Recommendations is part of the Digital Experience Platform. It requires a specific installation and license. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413192374029\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Email Product Recommendations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":49239,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7d92cc8f-aa49-4d71-8b35-239d8a33ad43/Picture9.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7d92cc8f-aa49-4d71-8b35-239d8a33ad43/Picture9.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture9.png\",\"name\":\"Picture9.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7d92cc8f-aa49-4d71-8b35-239d8a33ad43\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":310},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Triggered Messages\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Send automated personalized emails via an Email Service Provider (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://webhelp.optimizely.com/latest/EN/personalization/triggered-messages.htm\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ESP\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") that are triggered by the on-site actions of the email recipient. These emails typically alert the user of a price reduction or some form of abandonment. Because Optimizely captures user behavior, you also can use this behavior to include alternative recommendations to abandoned or browsed products. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413192352397\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Triggered Messages\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Optimizely Apps\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are many applications (apps) made by Optimizely and third-parties, available for extending your Optimizely Digital Experience Platform. The apps from Optimizely described here add features such as search analytics, and social media and marketing tool integrations. Add-ons require separate installations, and some also require a specific license. See \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413191500301\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Marketing Automation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and other app descriptions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413192348813-Get-started-with-CMS\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Get started with CMS – Support Help Cente\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.optimizely.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413192348813-Get-started-with-CMS\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"r
